title: Battle Parties

meta.description: Store your Pokemon Go battle party

explanation: Battle parties are designed to work just like they do in game. You set them up with your pokemon, and then use them when you are doing battles. Your battle parties can be used by other players to simulate raids or pvp combat.

full.title: Party Full
full.description: You have reached the party size limit for this league

empty.title: Party Empty
empty.description: You have not added any Pokemon from your Pokebox to this Party

add.title: Battle Party
add.description: Choose a name for your Battle Party below in the box. Then add the party members by clicking on the 'add pokemon from your pokebox' button. Finally adjust the stats of your Pokemon by clicking on it

edit.title: Battle Party Edit
edit.description: Update the name of your Battle Party below in the text box. You can also change the league with the drop down. Then change the party members by clicking the 'change your battle party members' button. Finally, modify the stats of each Pokemon by clicking on it!
